style_palette.purpose: clinical clarity, imply science and trust

style_cues: Ingredient storytelling visuals highlighting Cognatiq, functional mushrooms, caffeine
transparent labeling close-ups with clear per-chew dosing
infographic style or stepwise patterns for cognitive support and energy benefits
professional but approachable aesthetic with easy-to-understand scientific content
facebook_ad.style_notes: Targets trust and transparency through educational content, making complex ingredients accessible and credible. Reinforces the brand’s science-backed foundation while maintaining approachability and ease of understanding.

visual_structure.primary_scene: Male gamer aged 25-35 intensely focused on a gaming screen, subtle cool blue tones on his face, room dimly lit with gaming setup visible showing headset and keyboard, conveying fatigue but sharp concentration after hours of play.
visual_structure.product_placement: Dynamind IQ premium chocolate-flavored soft chews package front and center on desk beside keyboard, crisply lit to highlight sleek pocket-ready pouch design with authentic branding and product name.
visual_structure.product_detail: A close-up insert of one chew held between fingers, showing smooth texture and chocolate tone; scientific transparent label overlay next to it showing per-chew dosing of Cognatiq, mushrooms, and caffeine in infographics style.
visual_structure.visual_harmony: Text overlays anchored to visual elements—headline near gamer’s focused eyes; proof text near product pouch; CTA near close-up chew image, all using bold sans-serif with clean white and teal backgrounds for clarity.
